label: Active Chat‑Participation Rate
description: % of project contributors who posted at least one message in chat in the past week.

label: Committer Churn Rate
description: % of last‑year committers now inactive — core‑dev retention.

label: Committer Concentration (Gini)
description: Inequality of commits among committers; higher = more concentrated.

label: Contributor Growth Rate (YoY)
description: Year‑over‑year momentum in contributor count.

label: Count of Occasional Contributors
description: Contributors with ≤ K contributions in the trailing year.

label: 90‑Day Retention (%)
description: Share of newcomers still active three months later.

label: Median Time‑to‑Second Contribution (days)
description: How quickly newcomers return with a second contribution.

label: New Contributors (count)
description: Number of developers whose first contribution landed in the period.

label: Onboarding Success Rate (%)
description: First PR / issue acceptance rate for newcomers.

label: Total Opened Issues
description: How many new issues were opened in the selected period.

label: Total Closed Issues
description: Issues closed in the selected period.

label: Issue Backlog Size
description: Number of open issues at the end of each window.

label: Opening Issues Rate
description: Daily / weekly / monthly count of issues opened (flow in).

label: Closing Issues Rate
description: Issues closed per period (flow out).

label: Time to First Answer
description: Average time for someone other than the author to reply to an issue.

label: Time to Close
description: Average time from issue opening to close.

label: Total Opened PRs
description: Pull requests opened in the selected period.

label: Total Closed PRs
description: Pull requests closed in the selected period.

label: Total Merged PRs
description: Merged pull requests in the period.

label: PR Backlog Size
description: Number of open pull requests over time.

label: Opening PR Rate
description: PRs opened per period.

label: Closing PR Rate
description: PRs closed per period.

label: Time to Close (PR)
description: Average time from PR creation to close.

label: Merge Rate (%)
description: Percentage of closed PRs that were merged.
